name: @starbunk/bunkbot
description: BunkBot - Next generation reply bot system

scripts.start:prod: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development DEBUG=true ts-node-dev --respawn --transpile-only -r tsconfig-paths/register src/index.ts
scripts.dev:watch: cross-env NODE_ENV=development DEBUG=true ts-node-dev --respawn --transpile-only -r tsconfig-paths/register src/index.ts
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.pipeline: npm run lint && npm run type-check && npm run build && npm run test:run
